subject: Question on how fast the bands should sweep
author: psfponies
full_text:
I went ahead and opened up my 12-820 RS radio and clipped the mute 
wire it is set up simular to the old 12-470 with wires instead of 
pins. It sweeps both bands fine. Is there any certain rate the band 
should be sweeping. I noticed that the FM band sweeps faster then the 
AM band.

Kay
